company: Swan Softweb Solutions Pvt Ltd, Ahmedabad

projects.name: Common Cents
highlights: Developed an end-to-end system to retrieve data from AWS Redshift to frontend UI.
Implemented an automated ETL process triggered by Lambda functions upon document storage in AWS S3 bucket.
Designed and executed extraction of data from documents and storage in Parquet file format.
Managed storage of Parquet files in Redshift data warehouse.

projects.name: Expertly
highlights: Leveraged state-of-the-art Large Language Models (LLMs) as a core component of Expertly's functionality, harnessing their natural language processing capabilities to enhance user interactions, automate tasks, and improve decision-making processes.
Engineered a robust microservice architecture, also known as microkernel architecture.
Established a custom framework, Common Toolkit, using Django framework to streamline development.
Integrated Common Backend and Common Toolkit as core components of the system.
Orchestrated the creation and registration of services using Common Toolkit and Common Backend.
Implemented a routing mechanism where requests are first handled by Common Backend and then directed to the appropriate service's backend.

Engineered a bus booking system.
